articles.title: Greetings to President of Vietnam
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Vietnam
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Truong Tan Sang, president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of its founding.
					 The message said that the Korean people are pleased with the big successes achieved by the Vietnamese people in the efforts to unify the country and build socialist Vietnam under the leadership of the Communist Party of Vietnam over the past 70 years and sincerely wish them new progress in their future work for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Vietnam provided by the preceding leaders would grow stronger and wished the Vietnamese president good health and greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Greetings to Vietnamese PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Vietnamese PM
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Nguyen Tan Dung, prime minister of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of its founding.
					 The message expressed belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation with a long history and tradition would grow stronger in all fields, wishing the prime minister and government of Vietnam greater successes in their work for industrializing the state and improving the people's living standards.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Pham Binh Minh, deputy prime minister and foreign minister, on the same day.

articles.title: Greetings to Slovak FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Slovak FM
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a message of greeting to Miroslav Lajcak, foreign minister of Slovakia, on Tuesday on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged Not to Behave Contrary to Hard-won Atmosphere of Improving Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged Not to Behave Contrary to Hard-won Atmosphere of Improving Inter-Korean Relations
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Very ill-boding ceaseless demeanors chilling the atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations have been reported from south Korea since the publication of the joint press release to bring pain to Koreans.
					 A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK issued a statement on Wednesday, prompted by its desire to keep the hard-won atmosphere of improving the north-south relations afloat and open up their prospect.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should, to begin with, stop dishonest demeanors of ceaselessly floating story that "security crisis was caused by the north first" and it is "chiefly to  blame" for the recent dangerous crisis.
					
					 The chief executive of south Korea blustered at Chongwadae that "the crisis was caused by the north's landmine and shelling".
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin, chief of the security office of Chongwadae who came to the contact, is spreading rumor that the south wrested "apology from the north", claiming that the north "made an apology" for "planting landmine" and pledged to make efforts to defuse tensions and prevent the recurrence of the case.
					
					 Worse still, Hong Yong Phyo, minister of "Unification", unhesitatingly let loose a spate of sophism that "May 24 step" can be lifted when priority is given to the "north's apology" for the Cheonan warship sinking case, measure for preventing  the recurrence of the case and punishment of those responsible for it as this opportunity is the "first instance" in which the south wrested a "sure apology" from the north and the south laid a "stepping stone for ending the vicious cycle".
					
					 What is strange is that the south Korean authorities are spreading rumor that "regret" expressed by the north in the joint press release is the north's "admission" and "apology" for the suspicious case which occurred in the Demilitarized Zone.
					
					 They asserted that the word "regret" means the "apology of north Korean style" as it is a technical term which contains the intention of "apology" both from the legal point of view and in the light of practice at international political negotiations.
					
					 A linguistic expert of south Korea said that "expression  of regret" means, in fact, "the intention of inquiring after a sick person," clarifying its true meaning.
					
					 In a word, "regret" is no more than an expression that "I am sorry for the case".
					
					 A spokesman for the "Ministry of Unification", when asked on what ground it concluded the landmine blast in the DMZ as "a provocation from the north," was tongue-tied and simply uttered what was stated in the joint press release was a correct answer as he was not in a position to go into details."
					
					 This was quite different from the fact that the south remained silent about the blast of the similar "landmine" in the same place along the DMZ on August 23.
					
					 "Mine blast" of such kind that occurred in the DMZ is just a common accident.
					
					 Misjudgment of the rival would only entail catastrophic consequences in the north-south relations. The south should not forget this even a moment.
					
					 Next, the south Korean authorities should stop such foolish act of bluffing that the adoption of the joint press release was a "victory of theory of principle" won by them.
					
					 The south Korean political camp is noisily claiming that the south "won a score" and the north "lost a score" in the match for weathering the recent crisis.
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin and Hong Yong Phyo are main players here.
					
					 They are asserting that the joint press release was a result of the negotiations based on their consistent principle in which the "government" flatly rejected the north's demand even though it urged the south to stop anti-north loudspeaker broadcasts while creating crisis.
					
					 Those concerned of Chongwadae are also vociferating that the south forced the north to accept "the theory of principle" while "highly estimating the joint press release as it contained an apology from the north and its promise to prevent the recurrence of such incident as requested by Park Geun Hye."
					
					 An agreement by both sides is possible on mutual understanding of agenda items and recognition of them.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive, not content with getting busy making "encouraging phone calls", called law-makers from the "Saenuri Party" to Chongwadae on August 26 where she highly appreciated the joint press release as a result of "firm will" and "security awareness based on principle".  She even praised the negotiators for "approaching the contact on principle for the security of the people and the country". This is something beyond common sense.
					
					 Irony is that the representative of the "Saenuri Party" said the "only way of checking the north's provocation" is "resolute punishment" just the way he uttered before his American master while kowtowing to it. In response to his nonsense, such rubbish as "theory of principle for security" backed by "flank support" and "action of keeping pace" were heard all at the same time.
					
					 We are of the view that the successful tide-over of the crisis and the adoption of the joint press release were ascribable to the powerful capability for defence of the DPRK based on nuclear forces and the might of the single-minded unity of the army and people of the country.
					
					 This is also the result of the unanimous desire of all the Koreans to live in a peaceful environment free from confrontation and war.
					
					 It was a fair estimation by the world public.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once pointing an accusing finger at the DPRK, asserting that the accounts of the briefing made by the director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA on the result of the urgent contact were different from what was said at the contact."
					
					 The conservative reptile media in south Korea are misleading the public mindset, asserting the director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army was "double-tongued" when he claimed that "the south Korean regime fabricated a groundless case and unilaterally judged the situation which was created unilaterally" and that the "government should protest against it."
					
					 What the director of the KPA General Political Bureau mentioned as regards the urgent contact reflected the stand of the party, army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Saying this or that about it cannot but be viewed as a behavior devoid of elementary etiquette toward the dialogue partner.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean authorities unhesitatingly made such ridiculous remarks that they should not slacken alert, pinning hope on improving the north-south relations, but avoid "over-speed".  
					
					 The security meeting of Chongwadae held on August 27 called for refraining from having "too much optimism" as the north-south negotiations are not over but they are just a beginning.
					
					 A spokesman for the "Ministry of Unification" even said that speedy development of the north-south relations should be avoided as the "May 24 step" has not yet been lifted and, therefore, "not much should be expected from the reunions of separated families and relatives".
					
					 Assertion calling for avoiding "speedy" development of the north-south ties is a revelation of ill intention of cross-minded guys who are displeased with the improvement and development of the north-south ties.
					
					 Yun Pyong Se went the lengths of talking such rubbish that the adoption of the joint press release is a "victory of the close south Korea-U.S. alliance".
					
					 The south Korean authorities' reckless act has reached the phase of staging "integrated firepower annihilating drill 2015" targeting the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Paying no heed to the changed atmosphere, the warmongers opened fire at "red marks" designated according to "operation" allegedly to cope with "north's provocation", military confrontation hysteria and wanton infringement upon the dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 The gravity of the situation was that even the south Korean chief executive joined warmongers to hurl them into the confrontation racket.
					
					 Dialogue is not a veil for concealing the confrontation scenario.
					
					 Nothing will be more shameless than trumpeting about the implementation of the agreement while staging saber-rattling.
					
					 Very serious are these developments in just several days after the publication of the joint press release. 
					
					 The north-south relations can never be mended by unilateral sincere efforts.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not make a foolish misinterpretation of the hard weathering of such crisis on the eve of war and refrain from such act as threatening the hard-won peace.
					
					 Those who took part in the contact, in particular, should be prudent in their remarks.
					
					 What is essential at present is that any remark and any behavior would be a barometer judging whether one has etiquette of respecting one's dialogue partner or considering one as an object of mistrust and antagonism.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should pay heed with utmost consideration to the advice of the DPRK reflecting its patience and generosity.
					
					 An agreement by both sides should be implemented and one step taken today will lead to ten, nay hundreds steps tomorrow.
					
					 The tiding over of the crisis does not mean the achievement of peace
					
					 We are following with higher vigilance the future moves of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for China
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation headed by Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, left here on Wednesday to take part in celebrations marking the 70th anniversary of the victory in the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression and the World Anti-Fascist War to be held in China.

articles.title: Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoners Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoners Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Former unconverted long-term prisoners visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday, 15 years after they were repatriated to the DPRK. 
					 They ardently missed the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu who took warm care of the unconverted long-term prisoners and their families by giving them worthwhile life as men of strong faith and will and pro-reunification patriotic fighters. 
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues and made bows.

articles.title: Performance Given by State Merited Chorus and Chongbong Band for Guests of Honor in Moscow
articles.content:
Performance Given by State Merited Chorus and Chongbong Band for Guests of Honor in Moscow
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus of the DPRK together with leading members of the Chongbong Band is visiting Russia this year, the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, the 70th anniversary of the victory of the great Patriotic War in Russia and the significant year of the DPRK-Russia friendship.
					 The performance for guests of honor was given by the State Merited Chorus together with the Chongbong Band at the Musical Hall Named after Tchaikovsky, a famous historic and cultural icon of Russia, on the evening of August 31 before full house.
					
					 Igor Morgulov, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kirill Stepanov, secretary of state and vice-minister of Development of Far East, Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, were among the audience.
					
					 Watching the performance were Russians of political, public and other circles and service personnel, citizens of Moscow, Koreans in Russia, DPRK Ambassador Kim Hyong Jun and staff members of his embassy in Moscow.
					
					 The performance divided into two parts raised its curtain with the playing of the national anthems of the DPRK and Russia.
					
					 Mesmerized by peculiar orchestral music of new style, the audience broke into enthusiastic applause. 
					
					 Put on the stage were orchestra and male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army" full of the spirit of sure victory of the heroic Korean People's Army, male chorus and light music "Song of Proud Guards Units", a popular famous song of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army which defeated the U.S. imperialists, female solo and male chorus "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" which reflects the reality of socialist Korea prospering on the road of Songun and other numbers.
					
					 Through orchestra "Selection of World Famous Songs" the performers vividly showed the appearance of the orchestra of the State Merited Chorus which has made leaping progress in its scope and the level of representation.
					
					 Orchestra, female chorus and chorus "For Peace", serial songs of Russia, presented by singers of the Chongbong Band together with artistes and instrumentalists of the State Merited Chorus immensely excited the audience.
					
					 They made truthful representation of song "Just War" which encouraged the Soviet people to turn out death-defying resistance against the fascist aggressors with burning hatred, "Song of Moscow", "Katsusha", "At Unknown Height", "Blue Handkerchief", "Day of Victory" and other songs which helped the Russian people unite in the patriotic spirit.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience from its beginning to its end as it made high ideological and artistic depiction of the militant friendship between the two countries which are growing stronger day by day on the basis of the firm faith and long-standing roots of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Floral baskets were conveyed to the performers in the names of the Ministry of Culture of Russia, the Russian Army Academic Song and Dance Ensemble Named after Alexandrov, the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company and the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 Igor Morgulov, Alexandr Matsegora and other personages said that the premiere given by the State Merited Chorus of the DPRK in Russia before full house under the deep care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un is decorating the year of the Russia-DPRK friendship most significantly, adding that through the performance they would put greater spurs to the development of the Russia-DPRK relations with fresh energy.
					
					 They noted that the dispatch of the State Merited Chorus to Russia by Kim Jong Un helps them deeply realize once again how deeply he is concerned for the development of the Russia-DPRK relations.
					
					 During break and at the end of the performance huge audience were reluctant to leave their seats and lavished their praises of the performance, saying "it was fascinating performance without an equal in the world" and "an artistically perfect performance gripping the hearts of the audience".
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of Kim Po Hyon, an ardent patriot, in Mangyongdae on Wednesday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of his demise.
					 Seen standing before the grave was a wreath sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Vice-Premier Ri Mu Yong, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, national institutions and educational institutions and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK was laid before the grave.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths in the names of working people's organizations, national institutions, revolutionary schools and the party and power organs, universities and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute, recollecting the career of Kim Po Hyon.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Insam Held
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Insam Held
						
 Kaesong, September 2 (KCNA) -- There took place a scientific and technological presentation in the field of insam (ginseng) in Kaesong City on Tuesday and Wednesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea. 
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and officials of the Taesong Guidance Bureau, Academy of Agricultural Science, Koryo Songgyungwan University and other units. 
					
					 Valuable papers were presented there. They reflect successes and experience gained in keeping pure breed of Kaesong Koryo insam, establishing its seeding selection system and in its cultivation and processing methods. 
					
					 There were also lectures on diverse problems including recent world trend of development of insam cultivation technology, orientation of development of insam products and the world insam market tendency.

articles.title: Achievements Made in DPRK for Development of Education
articles.content:
Achievements Made in DPRK for Development of Education
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements have been made in the DPRK to promote the nation's development of education.
					 Scientists in the field of higher and normal education produced a number of reference books, including "Education Science and Fresh Teaching Method" and "The Principles of Curricula Composition at Factory College". And 10-odd kinds of textbooks were rewritten in way of helping raise the students' practical abilities.
					
					 Similar scientific successes were also registered in the field of general education to improve the education content and method in keeping with the universal 12-year compulsory education system now in force.
					
					 They include the way of putting classrooms on a multi-functional basis, programming for simulation experiment on chemistry subject and new textbooks and references for kindergartens, primary schools and junior and senior secondary schools.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Are Source of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Are Source of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The situation on the Korean Peninsula reached the brink of a war recently entirely because of the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills staged by the U.S. in collusion with south Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary. 
					 The Russian paper Moskovskii Komsomolets, the French paper Le Monde and the Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong, China and experts on Korean issues of neighboring countries of Korea made such comments.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The history of the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills means the one in which they have resorted to the moves for invading the north and igniting a nuclear war, escalating the tension on the peninsula every year.
					
					 Under the present situation where the Armistice Agreement is not in force, the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills serve as main factor of a war.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the U.S. in staging ceaseless joint military drills. They are aimed to escalate the tension on the peninsula to the worst phase and attain its strategic purpose of dominating the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged in its aggressive nature as it seeks to invade the DPRK to occupy the whole of Korea, threaten and blackmail big powers in the Asia-Pacific region by force of arms and dominate it. This nature of the U.S. imperialists can never change until they are eliminated from the earth.
					
					 The DPRK will put steady spurs to bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self-defense as long as the U.S. keeps escalating the tension through joint military drills in south Korea,

articles.title: Those of Strong Revolutionary Faith and Indomitable Will Are Sure to Emerge Victorious: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Those of Strong Revolutionary Faith and Indomitable Will Are Sure to Emerge Victorious: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The history of the Korean revolution is the glorious one that was pioneered by faith and has emerged victorious by faith, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Revolution precisely means faith and will. There must be difficulties and hardships in the road of the revolution. If one is to become a final victor in the road of grim struggle, it is necessary to keep the strong and undaunted faith and will in any adversity. It is the faith of the revolutionaries that they have to keep even though their flesh is torn to shreds and ground to powder and it is again this faith that they must neither abandon nor give up even if they may breathe their last and be charred to death.
					
					 The faith of the revolutionaries is formed and consolidated under the care of the great leader. The whole course of the Korean revolution which advanced and emerged victorious under the leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu is the course of the struggle which brought up those of faith and will who did not yield under any hardships and difficulties. During these days, such men strong in faith and fighters of will as former unconverted long-term prisoners were produced that can never be seen in any other country in the world. 
					
					 The former unconverted long-term prisoners overcame the mediaeval punishment and sweet appeasement and mounted the scaffolds with smiles. Therefore, they clearly showed before the world how strong the faith and will of the members of the Workers' Party of Korea believing and following the party and the leader are. 
					
					 Those of strong revolutionary faith and indomitable will are sure to emerge victorious.
					
					 No one can block the road of the army and people of the DPRK dashing forward just as in the spirit of snowstorm over Mt. Paektu while overcoming difficulties with indomitable faith and will under the leadership of the great party.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Introduces Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoners
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Introduces Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoners 
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Thongil News on August 31 posted an article 15 years after the repatriation of former unconverted long-term prisoners. 
					 September 2, 15 years ago 63 unconverted long-term prisoners were repatriated to the north through Panmunjom, the article said, and went on:
					
					 All the repatriated long-term prisoners received the National Reunification Prize and the title of the DPRK Hero. 
					
					 Even though some of them passed away, they are praised as indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighters who fought to the last, true to the revolutionary principle and sense of obligation, bravely meeting hardships in prison for several decades. 
					
					 Some of the unconverted long-term prisoners got married in Pyongyang to enjoy a happy life. One of them had a daughter and Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission, named her "Chuk Bok". 
					
					 Some of them received doctorates and they are waging dynamic social activities full of energy despite their advanced ages. The repatriation was a dramatic event which could have been impossible without the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Korean Victims in Great Kanto Quake Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Korean Victims in Great Kanto Quake Held 
						
 Tokyo, September 1 (KNS-KCNA) -- 92 years have passed since the Japanese imperialists mercilessly killed Koreans in the great Kanto quake. There took place a memorial service of Koreans in Tokyo before the monument to the Korean victims in the great Kanto quake in Tokyo on Tuesday. 
					 Present at the memorial service were Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, senior officials of organizations and enterprises, chairmen of all branches, Korean residents and Japanese personages including the representative of the Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship. 
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute in memory of the victims. 
					
					 Hwang Myong made a memorial address. 
					
					 He noted that though 92 years have passed since then, the Japanese authorities have not probed the truth behind the case but covered up the historical fact of massacring Koreans, far from making an apology and reparation for the Korean victims. 
					
					 He expressed his surging indignation at the Japanese reactionaries who are threatening the lives of the Koreans in Japan and creating a terror-ridden atmosphere reminiscent of that 92 years ago when they indiscriminately massacred Koreans.
					
					 He urged the Japanese authorities to draw due lesson from the war of aggression and colonial policy in the past century including massacre of Koreans in the great Kanto quake and stop the racket of sanctions against the DPRK and unreasonable mistreatment of Chongryon and violation of human rights of Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 Speeches were made by Japanese personages and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Bodies of Ecuador and Bulgaria Release Bulletins
articles.content:
Bodies of Ecuador and Bulgaria Release Bulletins
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Bodies of Ecuador and Bulgaria released bulletins on August 24 on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 The bulletins released by the Canar Provincial Institute for Friendship and Solidarity with the DPRK and the Guaranda Association for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People of Ecuador carried articles praising the exploits performed by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu who built the Juche-oriented socialist power and turned it into a satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Sending warm congratulations on the Day of Songun, Korean people's holiday which will go down through posterity the history of the Songun leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, the articles expressed a down-the-line support and solidarity for the struggle of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty of the country and nation and to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 A bulletin released by the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association carried an article saying that the Korean people are well aware of the truth that no one can attack them if they are strong in power but if not, they will be ruined by outside forces.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Based on this truth, leader Kim Jong Il applied Songun politics in all fields.
					
					 The Korean People's Army developed into the invincible revolutionary army, socialist construction is being dynamically propelled with the people's army as the pillar of the revolution and the DPRK has access to nuclear weapons thanks to the Songun politics.
					
					 The Korean people are greatly proud of their country which turned into a military power with nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Praises DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Praises DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Love for human is state policy in DPRK" on its website on August 7.
					 The article enumerated on the popular election system being enforced in the DPRK and the fact that all people freely participate in the political activities.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 There is no exploitation and oppression of man by man and there do not exist such severe social issues as "the rich getting ever richer and the poor getting ever poorer" in the DPRK. Everyone enjoys a stable life there.
					
					 The Korean society is just the one where all members of the society are provided all the rights as social human being including the right to labor, the right to rest and the one to receive free education and medical treatment.
					
					 Saying that there can not be found unemployed persons in the DPRK, the article praised the Socialist Labor Law.
					
					 It noted that the excellent guarantee for the human rights in the DPRK is related to the fact that the DPRK regards the Juche idea as guidelines.
					
					 It stressed that the Juche idea, an outlook viewing the world with man on the centre, demands that man is treated as the strongest and the most valuable being in the world and everything is made to serve them.

articles.title: Venezuelan Paper Supports Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Venezuelan Paper Supports Korea's Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Venezuelan paper Vea on August 24 carried an article titled "Independence guarantees Korea's reunification".
					 The paper referred to the fact that the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released a report dealing with the research data on scientific accuracy, validity and vitality of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's idea for independent reunification on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Korea was forced to be divided into two by foreign forces against the will of its nation.
					
					 Outsiders are benefiting more from antagonism and confrontation between the north and the south of Korea than from their reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 It is self-evident that the Korean nation will become a plaything of outsiders and scapegoat in their scramble in case they are allowed to interfere in the issue of Korea's reunification in the future.
					
					 To provide a peaceful environment on the Korean Peninsula is an indispensable desire for smoothly realizing the independent reunification by putting an end to the interference of outsiders while removing the danger of war at the same time.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to make sure that Korea is reunified in such a way as to be beneficial to the prosperity of other countries in the region including its neighboring countries.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause Supported in Philippines, Syria
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause Supported in Philippines, Syria 
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A Philippine body and Syrian personage extended full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people for achieving the reunification of the country. 
					 The Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula in a statement on Aug. 21 called upon all the Korean people in the north and the south and overseas to make positive efforts for defusing the tension in the peninsula and averting a war. 
					
					 The situation of the Korean Peninsula has continuously worsened since the country was divided by the U.S. and its troops militarily occupied south Korea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Therefore, we assert that the U.S. troops should be withdrawn from south Korea and war moves be stopped in the Korean Peninsula and the region. 
					
					 Saber Ballul, head of the Department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus of Syria, in his statement on August 25 said the DPRK is a powerful country no one dares provoke. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that the Korean people are the heroic people with strong will to resolutely smash the moves of provokers who infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the country. 
					
					 The U.S. is trying to stifle the DPRK, being oblivious of the lesson drawn in the last Korean War and this is the height of foolishness.

articles.title: Cuban Paper Marks 55th Anniversary of DPRK-Cuba Diplomatic Ties
articles.content:
Cuban Paper Marks 55th Anniversary of DPRK-Cuba Diplomatic Ties 
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Cuban newspaper Granma on August 29 carried an article titled "Friendship between the Republic of Cuba and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will be forever" to mark the 55th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries. 
					 The article said the peoples of Cuba and the DPRK have supported and cooperated with each other on the basis of the revolutionary principle and sense of obligation to strengthen the fraternal bonds. 
					
					 Noting that President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, extended support and solidarity to the struggle of the Cuban people at the Caribbean Sea crisis and took measures so that the members of the DPRK embassy in Havana and Korean students in Cuba fully supported the fraternal Cuban people, the article went on:
					
					 Leader of the Cuban revolution Fidel Castro Ruz always gave selfless aid to the just cause of the Korean people for socialist construction and independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 The Korean people have sent invariable support and solidarity to the struggle of the Cuban people advancing under the leadership of Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz for over half a century. 
					
					 The Cuban and Korean peoples will make every effort to further boost the friendly and cooperative relations true to the noble intention of the supreme leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 70o aniversario de Republica Socialista de Vietnam
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 70o aniversario de Republica Socialista de Vietnam
						
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, Truong Tan Sang, con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la RSV.
					El remitente subraya que el pueblo coreano esta complacido de que durante los 70 anos transcurridos, el pueblo vietnamita haya logrado grandes exitos en la lucha por obtener la reunificacion del pais y construir Vietnam socialista bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de Vietnam y desea de todo corazon al pueblo vietnamita logre nuevo avance en su labor posterior para la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Convencido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Vietnam, preparadas por los lideres antecedentes, se amplien y se desarrollen mas tambien en el futuro, el remitente formula votos por la salud del destinatario y mayores exitos en sus trabajos responsables.

articles.title: Portavoz de Departamento de Politica de CDN advierte a Sur de Corea a moderarse en palabras
articles.content:
Portavoz de Departamento de Politica de CDN advierte a Sur de Corea a moderarse en palabras
						
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Despues de publicada la informacion conjunta, en el Sur de Corea salen las palabras infructuosas al ambiente de la mejora de las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, lo cual aflige a la nacion. 
					Con la unica voluntad de mantener el ambiente de la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas preparadas a duras penas y abrir su buena perspectiva, el portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 2 la siguiente declaracion:
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben dejar primero su proceder injusto de seguir divulgando el rumor de que "la crisis de seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana fue iniciada por el Norte de Corea" y el Norte es el "autor" de la presente crisis. 
					
					La mandataria surcoreana dijo publicamente en Chongwadae que "la presente crisis fue causada por la provocacion de mina y el canonazo del Norte". 
					
					El jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad de Chongwadae, Kim Kwan Jin, quien participo en el contacto, dijo como si la parte Norte hubiera "pedido perdon" por la "provocacion de mina" y decidido a hacer esfuerzos por la distension y la no repeticion del caso y difunde el rumor erroneo de que el Sur "recibio el perdon del Norte". 
					
					En tanto, el ministro de "Unificacion", Hong Yong Phyo, solto la sofisteria de que esta vez, el Sur de Corea recibio por primera vez el "perdon cierto" del Norte y preparo "el fundamento para acabar con la circulacion viciosa" y que "las  medidas del 24 de mayo tambien seran eliminadas cuando el Norte pida perdon por el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta ´Cheonan´, tome las medidas de no repeticion y castigue a los culpables". 
					
					Lo mas ridiculo es que las autoridades surcoreanas difunden el rumor de que la "lastima" del Norte expresada en la informacion conjunta significa el "reconocimiento" y "perdon" del Norte por el incidente sospechoso ocurrido en la zona desmilitarizada. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas insisten en que el termino "lastima" contiene el sentido de "perdon" tanto en el punto de vista juridico como en las costumbres de las negociaciones politicas internacionales. 
					
					Un linguista surcoreano dijo que la "expresion de lastima" significa "preocupacion por la enfermedad". 
					
					Pues, la "lastima" quiere decir "lo siento mucho". 
					
					Por lo tanto, a la pregunta cual es el motivo de poder  afirmar que el caso de explosion de mina ocurrido en la zona desmilitarizada es la "provocacion del Norte", el vocero del "Ministerio de Unificacion" contesto con una palabra de que "la informacion es una respuesta correcta dado que no pudiera enumerar lo todo".
					
					Es un fenomeno contrastante con la palabra callada sobre el igual caso ocurrido el 23 de agosto en el mismo lugar.
					
					El caso de "explosion de mina" ocurrido en la zona desmilitarizada no es nada mas que un incidente ocurrido a menudo.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben olvidar que el mal juicio a su contraparte causara sin falta una consecuencia catastrofica en las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Y deben dejar las absurdidades de soltar los disparates como si la aprobacion de la informacion conjunta fuera la "victoria de su teoria de principios".
					
					Ahora, el circulo politico del Sur de Corea habla ruidosamente de que en el desmontaje de la "espoleta" de la presente crisis, ellos mismos "ganaron" y el Norte de Corea "perdio".
					
					Kim Kwan Jin y Hong Yong Phyo toman activa parte en soltar tales palabrerias.
					
					Con respecto a la informacion conjunta aprobada, ellos insisten en que es un producto obtenido tras participar en las negociaciones manteniendose en los principios invariables y rechazando rotundamente la demanda del Norte de interrumpir la radiodifusion creando la crisis.
					
					Los relacionados de Chongwadae disparatean como si inculcaran a alguien la "teoria de principios sobre el Norte" diciendo que "evaluan altamente el hecho de que el acuerdo contiene la disculpa del Norte y la promesa de la no repeticion de provocaciones exigidas por Park Geun-hye".
					
					El acuerdo entre ambas partes se logra a base de entendimiento y reconocimiento reciprocos sobre los casos  ocurridos.
					
					Al cabo de "telefonear para estimular", el dia 26, la mandataria surcoreana llamo a Chongwadae a los parlamentarios del "Partido Saenuri" para elogiarse a si misma diciendo que "es un exito alcanzado con la invariable conciencia sobre la seguridad penetrado por los principios" y que "mantuvo hasta el fin los principios para la seguridad de los habitantes y el Estado", lo que es una vanagloria fuera de conocimiento elemental.
					
					Lo mas ridiculo es que el delegado del "Partido Saenuri" disparateo que el "unico metodo para prevenir la provocacion del Norte" es la "represalia rotunda" y solto unas locuras tales como la llamada "teoria de principios de seguridad", el "apoyo de flanco" y el "ajuste del paso".
					
					Nosotros estimamos que la recuperacion de la crisis y la aprobacion de la informacion conjunta fueron alcanzadas por las poderosas fuerzas autodefensivas a base de las fuerzas armadas nucleares y el poderio de la unidad monolitica del ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					Y es el producto del unanime deseo de todos los coreanos de vivir en un ambiente pacifico sin la confrontacion ni la guerra.
					
					Esto es la evaluacion imparcial no solo de nosotros sino tambien de todo el mundo.
					
					Cuando el jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC publico el resultado del contacto urgente, las autoridades surcoreanas lo calumniaron como "inversion de palabra". 
					
					Ellas deben dejar de inmediato este proceder irreflexivo.
					
					Los medios de prensa conservadores inducen en error la opinion publica diciendo que el "gobierno debe protestar" al Norte por las palabras del jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC quien dijo que "las autoridades surcoreanas juzgaron unilateralmente con hechos infundados los incidentes ocurridos parcialmente".
					
					Las palabras del jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC sobre el contacto urgente de alto nivel Norte-Sur reflejan la posicion de nuestro partido, el ejercito y el pueblo. 
					
					Criticarlas es una inmoralidad e ignorancia sobre la contraparte del dialogo.
					
					Lo mas problematico es que las autoridades surcoreanas sueltan sin escrupulos el disparate de que no deben relajar la alerta y exceder la velocidad abrigando alguna ilusion sobre la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					En la reunion de seguridad de Chongwadae, convocada el 27 de agosto, salieron los disparates de que hay que "guardarse de abrigar el optimismo demasiado", ya que las negociaciones Norte-Sur no terminaron sino comienzan por ahora.
					
					En particular, el vocero del "Ministerio de Unificacion" insistio en "contenerse en la esperanza en el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados, puesto que es abstinente el exceso en las relaciones intercoreanas mientras no se cancelen las medidas del 24 de mayo". 
					
					Esta insistencia es la expresion de las malas entranas de los que no desean la mejora y el desarrollo de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					Yun Pyong Se dijo absurdamente que la aprobacion de la informacion conjunta es la "victoria del fortalecimiento de la alianza Sur de Corea-EE.UU.".
					
					Con tal imprudencia las autoridades surcoreanas libraron hasta los "ejercicios combinados de aniquilacion con fuego 2015" tomando como blanco a la parte connacional.
					
					Sin tener en consideracion el ambiente cambiado, los belicistas dispararon balas y proyectiles hacia el "blanco rojo" establecido para la "operacion de represalia" frente a la "provocacion del Norte". De esta manera, infringieron brutalmente la dignidad de la RPDC. 
					
					Lo grave del caso es que la mandataria surcoreana instigo en el mismo terreno a los belicistas al enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					  El dialogo no es el velo para ocultar la mala intencion de enfrentamiento.
					
					  No habra otro acto mas cinico que insistir en la ejecucion del acuerdo tirando balas y proyectiles.
					
					  Son muy serios los hechos de los ultimos dias despues de publicada la informacion conjunta Norte-Sur.
					
					  Las relaciones intercoreanas no se resuelven por la sinceridad o esfuerzos de una parte. 
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben comentar con incoherencia la prevencion de los desastres de la guerra, lograda a duras penas, ni amenazar la paz rescatada tan dificilmente. 
					
					  En particular, los participantes en el contacto urgente deben prestar prudencia a sus palabras. 
					
					  Lo mas importante en la actualidad es expresar en sus palabras y acciones el respeto o la desconfianza y hostilidad a la contraparte. 
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben aceptar con maxima prudencia nuestro consejo paciente y magnanimo. 
					
					  El acuerdo entre ambas partes coreanas es necesario para la practica y un paso de hoy llevara diez y cien pasos de manana. 
					
					  La superacion de la crisis no significa la llegada de la paz.
					
					  La RPDC observa con mas vigilancia que antes las acciones posteriores de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Parte hacia China delegacion de RPDC
articles.content:
Parte hacia China delegacion de RPDC 
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, partio hoy de esta capital para participar en el acto por el 70o aniversario de la victoria en la guerra antijaponesa del pueblo chino y en la guerra antifascista del mundo a efectuarse en China.

articles.title: Efectuada en Moscu funcion conjunta de Coro Estatal Benemerito y Banda Chongbong
articles.content:
Efectuada en Moscu funcion conjunta de Coro Estatal Benemerito y Banda Chongbong
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Este ano significativo, ano de amistad Corea-Rusia en que se cumple el 70o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea y de la victoria de Rusia en la gran guerra de la patria, realizan una visita a Rusia el Coro Estatal Benemerito y las actrices de la Banda Chongbong de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Tuvo lugar con solemnidad por la noche del 31 de agosto en el teatro musical Tchaikovsky, famoso objeto historico y cultural de Rusia, la funcion conjunta de invitacion del Coro Estatal Benemerito y la Banda Chongbong de la RPDC.
					
					Fueron invitados el vicecanciller ruso, Igor Morgulov, el secretario de Estado y viceministro del Ministerio de Desarrollo del Lejano Oriente, Kirill Stepanov y el embajador ruso en la RPDC, Alexandr Matsegora.
					
					Presenciaron la funcion las personalidades del circulo politico y social y otras esferas, los uniformados, los ciudadanos de Moscu, los coreanos residentes en Rusia, el embajador Kim Hyong Jun y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica de la RPDC en Rusia.
					
					La funcion iniciada con himnos nacionales de la RPDC y Rusia se efectuo dividida en dos partes.
					
					Se pusieron en la escena la musica orquestal y el coro masculino "Cancion del Ejercito Popular de Corea", el coro masculino y la musica ligera "Cancion de orgullo de unidades guardias", el solo femenino y el coro masculino "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol" y otras piezas.
					
					A traves de la musica orquestal "Serie de musicas famosas mundiales", los interpretes manifestaron el aspecto de la orquesta del Coro Estatal Benemerito desarrollado vertiginosamente tanto en el tamano como en el nivel de   descripcion.
					
					Animo a los espectadores la musica en serie de Rusia "Por la paz" que las actrices de la Banda Chongbong y los actores y ejecutantes del Coro Estatal Benemerito interpretaron con la musica orquestal y el coro femenino.
					
					Y se ofrecieron tambien las musicas rusas como "Lucha de justicia", "Cancion de Moscu", "Katsusha", "En la cota anonima", "Toalla azul" y "Dia de la victoria".
					
					La funcion fue aplaudida altamente por los espectadores por  describir en un alto plano ideologico y artistico la amistad combativa entre ambos paises que se fortalece cada dia mas a base de la conviccion invariable del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos y larga tradicion historica.
					
					Fueron entregados a los ejecutantes cestos de flores en nombre del Ministerio de Cultura, el Conjunto Artistico Academico del Ejercito Ruso y el Conjunto de Danza Folclorica Academica Nacional Igor Moiseyev, de Rusia y la embajada coreana en Rusia.
					
					El vicecanciller ruso Igor Morgulov, el embajador ruso en la RPDC, Alexandr Matsegora y otras personalidades dijeron que la primera funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito efectuada felizmente en Rusia bajo la profunda atencion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un adorna con mas significado el ano de amistad Rusia-Corea y que animados por esta funcion, impulsaran mas el desarrollo de las relaciones entre Rusia y la RPDC.
					
					Y subrayaron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio a Rusia el Coro Estatal Benemerito, lo cual les hace conocer que el lider coreano presta mucha atencion al desarrollo de las relaciones Rusia-Corea.
					
					En la hora de reposo y al termino de la funcion, muchos espectadores alabaron el Coro Estatal Benemerito y la Banda Chongbong diciendo que ofrecieron la funcion maravillosa preparada perfectamente en lo artistico.
					
					La funcion continua.
